projects.description:
Project Lead (last 2 years)
Tasks: Project Management, Research in the area of optimizing CPR: physiological monitoring, CPR data analysis, physiological modeling of CPR blood flow, physiological modeling of CPR O2 & CO2 gas exchange, data mining, animal testing of an ACPR device, post resuscitation management (vibration), CPR related clinical experiments, IP generation
